meanings.definition: Stated or described clearly and with detail.
meanings.sent1: The teacher gave a defined explanation of the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The defined rules of the game helped everyone understand how to play.
meanings.sent3: The defined instructions on the recipe made it easy to bake the cake.
meanings.sent4: Her defined goals guided her towards success in her career.
meanings.sent5: The defined path through the forest was easy to follow.

meanings.definition: To establish the meaning or identity of something.
meanings.sent1: She defined the unfamiliar word by looking it up in the dictionary.
meanings.sent2: The scientist defined the new species of plant he discovered.
meanings.sent3: He defined his role in the group project by taking charge of the research.
meanings.sent4: The artist defined her style by experimenting with different techniques.
meanings.sent5: The detective defined the suspect's alibi by checking security camera footage.

meanings.definition: To mark the limits or boundaries of something.
meanings.sent1: The fence defined the property line between the two houses.
meanings.sent2: The river defined the edge of the national park.
meanings.sent3: The chalk line defined the area where the new building would be constructed.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range defined the border between the two countries.
meanings.sent5: The sign defined the entrance to the nature reserve.
